arts.ttl: Scotland v Belarus: World Cup 2026 qualifying – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ World Cup qualifying news from 5pm BST kick-off ⚽️ Live scoreboard | Read Football Daily | Mail Rob An email from Steven Grundy, who speaks for a nation “The best scenario for us Scots would probably be: Smash Belarus 5-0 Get a dodgy draw in Greece Beat the Danes with a cheeky corner on a wet, windy & miserable night in Bonnie Scotland. Down to 10 men against Belarus after 25 minutes & get a dodgy draw just to give us a quantum of hope Get battered 3-0 by a bitter Greek team Lose 1-0 to the Danes after conceding a 95th-minute penalty.” Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Scotland vs Belarus – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Scotland and Belarus face off in their next World Cup qualifier at Hampden Park on Sunday. Steve Clarke’s side will be looking to maintain their perfect home record and extend their commanding lead over third-place Greece in Group C, while Belarus remain without a point from their opening three qualifiers.
